title: A Book for Christmas
body: If you can tear yourself away from hacking over this Christmas season, I have a book to recommend that you read: Three Cups of Tea: One Man's Mission to Fight Terrorism and Build Nations . . . One School at a Time by Greg Mortenson and David Oliver Relin. If you feel in need of a little inspiration, are even slightly put off by the state of the world, are out of touch with what Christmas was really supposed to be about, or just want some good adventurous reading; then this is the book for you.
